title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Blended Learning for Higher Education Sustainability and Education 4.0

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogical knowledge and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design a Blended Learning 4.0 strategy that reflects educational requirements in the Fourth Industrial Revolution era.
Learners can develop educational modules using personalized data and open-source content on a Moodle-based LMS.
Learners can implement educational approaches that integrate sustainability and digital technology through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
